item.title: China launches its silver weapon on Jan. 1. What that means for investors and prices.
item.description: China controls around 70% of the silver that Big Tech, AI and solar power desperately need. Beijing is about to lock the gates.

item.title: This winning fund manager spills 4 secrets about smart ways to buy non-U.S. stocks
item.description: David Herro is an experienced guide to the global market.

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
item.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”

item.title: Interest rates could be on hold ‘for some time,’ Fed minutes show
item.description: A pause would give Federal Reserve officials time to assess the effects of the three rate cuts made this year.
